"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a219b96368726a95190100#post_54a219b96368726a95190100
And here.

 I did not know that.
I knew otaku were looked down on but I thought it was in the same sense as manchildren here.

Well now I know. But I meant more in terms of the market supplying it. More adult cartoons are supplied in Japan, so economically it is not seen as a lost cause I suppose so there you go.

Ironically though, tangent... According to the guy innthe video I linked in SJW thread anime cons have an sjw issue and that may hold back it developing here since it would be appropriation (despite early anime being influenced by Disney).
